title: TRIBUTE TO JEYARAJ FERNANDOPULLE: The Voice that was to be silenced by death- still echoes from within.
content: By Dr.Telli C Rajaratnam I have ventured to write a synopsis of the achievements, vision, and career of Jeyaraj Fernandopulle, as a person who was well acquainted to him. I was impressed by his deep thoughts and the seriousness with which he took his duties to humanity. This is unusual for many who are in…
